channel.title: Iis on Raph's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Iis on Raph's Blog

item.title: On premise CI/CD/CD with VSTFS2015 and IIS
item.description: Many clients I visit are still not on the cloud and are still not using VSTS (Visual Studio Team Services) online and Azure. Meaning, they still have on premise infrastructure for their applications. Now, I don’t want this blog post to turn into a defence of cloud (more specifically PaaS). Rather, I want to quickly show you how you can setup a CI/CD/CD (Continuous Integration/Delivery/Deployment) delivery pipeline with an on-premise instance of VSTFS 2015 deploying to machines with IIS .
